## GlPoint2dNaturalLogTransform class

Applies natural log to an indexable gl connector. The behavior of the transform is undefined if any point is less than 0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GlPoint2dNaturalLogTransform implements IGlTransformComponent<TGl2ComponentRenderer, IGlIndexedPoint2dBinder<Float32Array>, ICartesian2dUpdateArg<Float32Array>, unknown> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IGlTransformComponent](./core.igltransformcomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TGl2ComponentRenderer](./core.tgl2componentrenderer.md)<!-- -->, [IGlIndexedPoint2dBinder](./cartesian-2d.iglindexedpoint2dbinder.md)<!-- -->&lt;Float32Array&gt;, [ICartesian2dUpdateArg](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dupdatearg.md)<!-- -->&lt;Float32Array&gt;, unknown&gt;
